titleInfo.title: Residents of the National Home for Jewish Children in Sunday School Class

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#388 Residents of Nat. Home for Jewish Children'' and ''Jewish Sheltering Home 1910-1950s''. On back of photograph: ''#388 Teac Abe Kershstein Head of Sunday School. 1942 Before this some kids were bused to BMH and some to Temple Emanuel. After a serious bus accident the Home decided to have their own Sunday School. Quiz in the Sunday School Class 6/42.''

mods.abstract: Teacher Abe Kirschstein stands behind Sunday School students seated at desks at the National Home for Jewish Children in Denver located in Denver, Colorado. From 1928-1952, the home was called the National Home for Jewish Children in Denver.
mods.note: Donated by the National Asthma Center.
